Package ohos.data.preferences

Interface Preferences.PreferencesObserver

  • Enclosing interface:
    Preferences

    public static interface Preferences.PreferencesObserver
    Provides an interface to listen for preference data changes.

    The observer of Preferences must implement the PreferencesObserver interface. You can use the Preferences#registerObserver method to register an observer for the Preferences object, and use the Preferences#unregisterObserver method to unregister the observer.

    Since:
    1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onChange​(Preferences preferences, String key)
      Observes the change of a certain preference.

    • Method Detail

      • onChange

        void onChange​(Preferences preferences,
              String key)
        Observes the change of a certain preference.
        Parameters:
        preferences - Indicates the changed Preferences object.
        key - Indicates the key of the changed preference.
        Since:
        1
